page.title: 16Recreation Sport Survey
page.content: was nearly on the floor with laughter because I had never seen him in shorts before. {Sports Survey} 20 families told us about their sports. What are Dads main sports? Golf 1 Fishing 3 Swimming 1 Karate 1 Quoits 1 Walking 1 Pigeon Racing 1 Running 2 Darts 2 Bowls 1 No Sports 6 What are Mams main sports? Keep Fit 1 Fishing 1 Swimming l Walking 2 snooker 2 Running 2 No sports 10 Does the family do any sport together? Walking 2 Cycling 1 Swimming 3 Football 1 Tennis 1 Yes but not stated 5. No sports together 7
